name: 2D Platformer - Space Escape
description:
2D Shooter Project- Space Escape:

1) Added two full on unique levels, the first is dropper sort of level and the second is one where you can choose two unknown sides with different difficulty with giant boss to jump past at the end.

2) Changed the entire Main Menu Screen along with updated UI art made.

3) Created my own music, so all beats are made by me. I made one for main menu, level 1, and level 2.

Created by Nicolas Georgescu
